description: Episode III - Love Seat - During the summer of 2005, RagingStallion had a five-week-long talent contest in southern Florida at theJackhammer bar. The winner got a free trip to San Francisco and wasgiven the best prize of all: a co-starring scene with hot, hunky,Arabian superstar Michael Vincenzo! That's right! Vincenzo hasreturned to movies as a Raging Stallion Exclusive. His Lebanesefeatures never looked hotter and who better to guide Michael Foxxthru his first porn scene! This one is romantic and lustful. The set isminimalist; it all takes place on a black leather couch. Kissing is themortar that holds this one together. Cocks grow stiff as the twoMichaels passionately embrace. Whenever a guy stars in his firstporn scene, there is a level of excitement that is palpable - this scenesays it all! Ripped abs, stunning chests, heavy balls - this is whatgreat porn is all about, and this scene is a showstopper from start tofinish.
title: Manifesto
